Oct 28 (Reuters) - 3i Group PLC III.L:

  • 3I ANNOUNCES SALE OF MAGNITUDE SOFTWARE GENERATING PROCEEDS OF $477M, MM OF 2.6X AND IRR OF 47%

  • 3I GROUP - 3I WILL MAKE A CO-INVESTMENT OF C.$50M INTO INSIGHTSOFTWARE

Source text for Eikon: [ID:]

Further company coverage: III.L
